means: 盲目自夸的，盲目自大的，傲慢的

sentence.Network_en: His classmates called him a show - off because of his bumptious airs.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于他老是装出一副自以为是的架势,所以同学们就叫他“自大的夜郎”.

sentence.Network_en: Some of these secular priests were ignorant, bumptious.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些俗里俗气的神父中有些人一窍不通, 自以为是.

sentence.Network_en: Keep that bumptious bastard out of my hair, but book me on his flights.
sentence.Network_cn: 别让这个自高自大的家伙惹我生气, 不过在替我订票的时候,要订他飞的班次.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... bully ? n. 欺凌弱小者 bumptious ? adj. 傲慢的 ，自夸的 bungle ? vt.vi. 办糟，失败.
bumpkin 土包子bumptious 瞎自夸的bumpy 颠簸的
黑宝书1 ... bumper n. 缓冲器,满杯,丰收 bumptious a. 瞎自夸的,瞎自大的,傲慢的 bung n. (桶口等的) 塞子.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: humorously from bump, on the pattern of fractious

entry.def: If you say that someone is bumptious, you are criticizing them because they are very pleased with themselves and their opinions.

example.tran: 一个傲慢的官僚主义者

auth_sentence.content: He seemed the quiet type and...a little cowed by his beautiful, bumptious wife.
auth_sentence.res_content: He seemed the quiet type and...a little cowed by his beautiful, bumptious wife.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He seemed the quiet type and...a little cowed by his beautiful, bumptious wife.

auth_sentence.content: Conductor Michele Mariotti leads a rather rough and ready performance; rhythms and tempi are bumptious and choruses noisy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Conductor Michele Mariotti leads a rather rough and ready performance; rhythms and tempi are bumptious and choruses noisy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Conductor Michele Mariotti leads a rather rough and ready performance; rhythms and tempi are bumptious and choruses noisy.
